content: once the 2012 games started i realised that i needed something to knit that wouldn t require any concentration at all so i made this and wrote up some instructions in case you want to make one ----------------------------------- all row are exactly the same the only stitches used are knit and knit front and back kfb the original idea was to alternate one solid yarn with one self-striping - maximum impact minimum effort - but you could use just one colour or lots you ll need a total of approx 440yds/400m of yarn any weight one two or more colours combine different weights for an interesting effect you will knit bottom-up so you can just stop when you run out of yarn or when you like the size the shawl can be knit with no border but for a more polished look you can choose from 3 options for tidying the edges - all quick and easy or improvise your own - some stunning examples already 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/stitchnerds/2251883/1-25
